original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel, saying, Whoever offers the sacrifice of his peace offerings to the Lord shall bring his offering to the Lord from the sacrifice of his peace offerings.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 화목제물을 여호와께 드리려는 자는 그 화목제물 중에서 그의 예물을 여호와께 가져오되

sentences.original_text: Speak to the people of Israel,
Whoever offers the sacrifice of his peace offerings to the Lord
shall bring his offering to the Lord
from the sacrifice of his peace offerings.
